title: Ballon d’Or 2019 nominees LIVE updates: Lionel Messi and Virgil van Dijk to head 30-man shortlist
text:
Lionel Messi, Virgil van Dijk and Cristiano Ronaldo are expected to lead the names on the 30-man shortlist for this year's Ballon d'Or.

Luka Modric's win in 2018 ended seven years of dominance by Ronaldo and Messi.

The Barcelona star has already taken the FIFA 'Men's Best' award and is battling Van Dijk to add another Golden Ball to his name.

However, the paid face stiff competition from the likes of Ronaldo, Sadio Mane, Mohamed Salah and Kylian Mbappe.

The winner of the prize will be named in Paris on December 2, but first the list will be condensed to a shortlist of nominees.

There are 30 names set to be announced throughout the day...Follow them all here.
description: Latest updates as the 30 nominees for football's biggest individual prize are revealed throughout the day
